ygData.subject: Re: Song Fizzles upon leveling
ygData.msgSnippet: Made a level as my cleric last night.  Now lvl 14 casting lvl 4 Light Healing spell.  Alteration (obviously) maxed for lvl 13.  112 Wis. Cast, fizz, fizz,
ygData.messageBody:
Made a level as my cleric last night. Now lvl 14 casting lvl 4 "Light
Healing" spell. Alteration (obviously) maxed for lvl 13. 112 Wis.

Cast, fizz, fizz, cast, cast, cast, fizz, fizz, cast, fizz.

Ironically that was my last fight of the evening since Veeshan (or at
least Lava Storm) crashed around 11:30 pm EST.

Of course since as soon as the fight started, we were experiencing that
pre-crash packet loss, my connection probably was very bad. So this fits
into both theories...

Our wizard is going to chart her fizzes when she levels (next Thurday).
She (like me) has a very strong connection normally.
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
